jobs.title: Graphic Designer & Video Editor – JVS GROUP
jobs.description: Design of visual content for events and cultural events. Creation of advertising spots for TV and online platforms. Development of branding materials, from logo to visual identity. Complete prepress preparation for large-format and standard print materials. Visual content for social media and online advertising (HTML5 / PPC banners). Motion graphics. Photography, interview filming, and video editing for digital content. Website edits in Wix.

jobs.description: Prepared data for printing. Performed color correction on prints. Collaborated on the production of promotional materials. Operated printing machines.
